  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213257</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ajax' Kindred's Soliloquy In Africa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ajax ' Kindreds Soliloquy In Afrika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soliloquy Analogue d'Ajax 'En Afrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Soliloquy Kindred De Ajax ' Em África</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soliloquy Affine Di Ajax 'In Africa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Kindred μονόλογος Ajax "στην Αφρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Soliloquio Emparentado De Ajax ' En África</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A videographical presentation of Frank Barbour Coffin's poem, followed by an uplifting audio performance of the musical composition "Zulu Prayer" by Thaumata.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine videographical Darstellung des Gedichtes des 
aufrichtigen Barbour Sarges, gefolgt von einer emporhebenden 
Audioleistung des musikalischen Aufbaus "Zulu-Gebet" durch Thaumata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation videographical de la poésie du 
cercueil franc de Barbour, suivie d'une exécution sonore élevante de
composition musicale "prière de Zoulou" par Thaumata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação videographical do poema do 
caixão frank de Barbour, seguida por um desempenho audio uplifting da
composição musical do "prayer tribo Zulu" por Thaumata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione videographical del poem della 
bara franca di Barbour, seguita dalle prestazioni audio uplifting 
della composizione musicale "preghiera zulù" da Thaumata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια videographical παρουσίαση του ποιήματος του 
Frank Barbour Coffin's, που ακολουθείται από μια 
uplifting ηχητική απόδοση της μουσικής σύνθεσης "ζουλού 
προσευχή" από Thaumata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación videographical del poema del 
ataúd franco de Barbour, seguida por un funcionamiento audio que 
eleva de la composición musical "rezo del Zulú" por Thaumata.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
